org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Class ReactorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, MessageSource, Reactor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadBoundReactor, UnboundReactor

    public abstract class ReactorBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reactor, MessageSource
    Base class for targetReactor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Facility facility
      The facility of this targetReactor.
      protected Inbox inbox
      The inbox, implemented as a doLocal queue and a concurrent queue.
      protected org.slf4j.Logger log
      Reactor logger.
      protected Outbox outbox
      Holds the buffered messages until they are passed as blocks to their various destinations.

      • ReactorBase

        public ReactorBase(Facility _facility,
           int _initialBufferSize,
           int _initialLocalQueueSize)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a targetReactor.
        Parameters:
        _facility - The facility of this targetReactor.
        _initialBufferSize - Initial size of the outbox for each unique message destination.
        _initialLocalQueueSize - The initial number of slots in the doLocal queue.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Returns true if close() has been called already. Can be called from anywhere.
        Specified by:

      • addAutoClosableSReq

        public SyncRequest<java.lang.Boolean> addAutoClosableSReq(java.lang.AutoCloseable _closeable)
        Returns a request to add an auto closeable, to be closed when the Facility closes. This request returns true if the AutoClosable was added.
        Specified by:
        addAutoClosableSReq in interface Reactor
        Parameters:
        _closeable - The autoclosable to be added to the list.
        Returns:
        The request.

      • hasWork

        public final boolean hasWork()
        Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed. (This method is not thread safe and must be called on the targetReactor's thread.)
        Returns:
        True if there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.

      • hasConcurrent

        public boolean hasConcurrent()
        Returns true when a message has been passed from another thread.
        Returns:
        True when a message has been passed from another thread.

      • isInboxEmpty

        public final boolean isInboxEmpty()
        Description copied from interface: Reactor
        Returns true when there are no more messages in the inbox. This method is generally only called by a processing's onIdle task to determine when to return so that an incoming message can be processed.
        Specified by:
        isInboxEmpty in interface Reactor
        Returns:
        True when the inbox is empty.

      • setExceptionHandler

        public final ExceptionHandler setExceptionHandler(ExceptionHandler _handler)
        Description copied from interface: Reactor
        Replace the current ExceptionHandler with another.

        When an event or request message is processed by a targetReactor, the current exception handler is set to null. When a request is sent by a targetReactor, the current exception handler is saved in the outgoing message and restored when the response message is processed.

        Specified by:
        setExceptionHandler in interface Reactor
        Parameters:
        _handler - The exception handler to be used now. May be null if the default exception handler is to be used.
        Returns:
        The exception handler that was previously in effect, or null if the default exception handler was in effect.

      • getExceptionHandler

        public final ExceptionHandler getExceptionHandler()
        The current exception handler.
        Returns:
        The current exception handler, or null.

      • unbufferedAddMessage

                        boolean _local)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Add a message directly to the input queue of a Reactor.
        Parameters:
        _message - A message.
        _local - True when the current thread is bound to the targetReactor.

        java.lang.Exception
